html:
3.26.20  10:15 pm   hello! you make me want to make art :-)

     holy oatmeal raisin pizza, you are very friendly

3.26.20  9:57 pm   been trying lately to record some music at home (written some lyrics but i wanna make some good tunes), and i've had some rough ideas i recorded where i would just keep hitting record when a new melody/chord chunk popped into my head. is this viable?

     could be

     i love music with complex structures but i worry that's just noodling and calling it a tune

     i have some exciting news for you: you are the one who gets to choose what it's called

3.26.20  9:32 pm   If you were at a campfire and somebody stuck a guitar in your hands, do you think you know your way around a guitar enough that you can entertain the folks around the campfire for the night?

     i think so, especially if i am allowed to sing

3.26.20  9:09 pm   what are your thoughts on bees?

     they are huge, especially in the car

3.26.20  8:30 pm   What inspires you?

     whenever i walk inside or outside, or through doors in general

3.26.20  8:06 pm   whats your favorite smell

     regular

3.26.20  8:03 pm   are there any bad words?

     yes, all of them

3.26.20  7:39 pm   i adore your musical style, and you honestly...

     oi, do i detect friendship

     but uh whats your favorite chord?

     music would be impossible with that attitude

3.26.20  7:18 pm   is this all because of something that already happened

     it is collaboration, between previous happenings, and you

3.26.20  7:08 pm   Okay, so I get that time is simply a measure of objects moving and behaving in space, but why does movement happen? And why does space exist? Of all the things that could exist, why space? Of all the ways that things could be, why exist?

     i blame you

3.26.20  6:51 pm   When is ur next vid coming out?

     i'm having a countdown timer

3.26.20  6:39 pm   why is everything so dumb and stupid

     that is due to intelligence

3.26.20  6:20 pm   i want to do a lot of things in life but scared of the long-term commitment. any advice?

     just wait a little longer and you will get so scared that you will suddenly find yourself ready to commit to anything and everything, in desperation

3.26.20  6:16 pm   How did you get so funny, and good at music as well

     the whole trick is to begin cultivating extremely high levels of normalcy, and normality

3.26.20  5:49 pm   How do you write a song?

     the scientific community is offering a near infinite reward for anyone who can definitively explain

     Or baby, is that just so wrong?

     it is its wrongness which makes it seem so right

3.26.20  5:30 pm   Im going to start learning music theory. What's the first thing I should know?

     how the music sounds, and how that makes you feel

3.26.20  5:29 pm   Is the date from the questions referring to the moment of asking or the moment of answering?

     asking

     I hope for your sleepcycle the first one tho :D

3.26.20  4:54 pm   Do you think in neon text?

     what the hell is neon text

3.26.20  4:35 pm   when is the next video

     i'm having a countdown timer

3.26.20  4:34 pm   You haven't quit youtube, right?

     not even close

     I really miss seeing your videos.

     i have some great news for you. go to my youtube channel and i think you will be pleased to find out you can still see them

3.26.20  4:32 pm   What are you thoughts on the Covid-19 outbreak?,

     it will take some time to collect my thoughts

      are you making sure you don't get infected?

     yes

3.26.20  4:31 pm   What are your favourite video games you like to play/ or favourite genre of video games

     the game where i figure out how to make videos

3.26.20  4:30 pm   What genre of music do you like?

     regular

3.26.20  4:26 pm   Do you feel alright, with the days gone by?

     some what

3.26.20  4:24 pm   do you even music?

     how did you know

3.26.20  4:19 pm   I think your songs are cool-and very creative! How do you find inspiration for them?

     inspiration is easy to find. it is literally everywhere. you won't believe how excited i was when i realized this

3.26.20  4:19 pm   You didnt answer a question on Thursday March 26th 9:32:55 AM.

     that's not true. i answered this one at that time

      Why?

3.26.20  4:02 pm   My guinea pig stares at me when i watch you. Do you have a alliance with him??

     no

3.26.20  4:01 pm   a fish inhaled my toe

     i believe you

3.26.20  3:40 pm   what is your favorite word

     whichever one i am currently saying

3.26.20  3:34 pm   How do you decide which questions to answer?

     my policy is to answer none of them but i frequently fuck up and disobey that policy

3.26.20  3:32 pm   What's your favorite food

     regular

3.26.20  3:05 pm   is a johnathon a marathon made out of johns

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      if so why do people keep running on john 

     i don't think they are

3.26.20  3:04 pm   im drawing a thing what should i name the thing

     My Thing

3.26.20  2:57 pm   how well can you play the guitar

     good enough to do it in a movie

3.26.20  2:40 pm   what is some advice for when you first make videos

     oh man, you're fucked

3.26.20  2:33 pm   What's the countdown timer at 

     11

3.26.20  2:24 pm   What is your favorite universe?

     regular

3.26.20  2:24 pm   Do you like what you do?

     yes, possibly too much

3.26.20  2:15 pm   What is truth

     you

3.26.20  1:30 pm   What are your thoughts on electricity?

     so ridiculous

3.26.20  1:27 pm   when are you coming back? ;(

     at the usual time, in the usual way

3.26.20  1:12 pm   thoughts on drawers

     fake

3.26.20  1:08 pm   im feeling fucking manic trying to get started on shit. i think years ago u mentioned something about not doing anything until you just couldnt anymore and i think im starting to maybe understand it now because im, how do you say, feeling hysterical :^))))) 

     yes that is a familiar feeling

3.26.20  12:52 pm   how does one vibe

     impossible. it can't be done

3.26.20  12:46 pm   picture of a stick?

      here you go

3.26.20  12:33 pm   Did you quit school cause the things you've been seeing there don't make sense?

     i thought that story was about you, but it reminds me of something i would do

3.26.20  12:29 pm   what is your next video

     i can't tell you

3.26.20  12:14 pm   what are your thoughts on ms paint

     never tried it

3.26.20  12:12 pm   is there anything worse than hitting your funny bone?

     yes
